name: Pete's Buffalo Baked Potatoes
author: Chef Claire
summary: Easy and delicious, this dish is always a hit whether served as part of a sit-down dinner or on game day.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 tablespoons Buffalo-style hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's®)
¼ cup blue cheese salad dressing
directions: Chop potatoes; place across bottom of a large, microwave-safe bowl
Spread mushroom soup, Cheddar cheese, and hot pepper sauce over potatoes
Cook potato mixture in the microwave until cheese bubbles, about 2 minutes
Mix blue cheese dressing into potato mixture
